structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
C RESTRUCTURE OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN COUNTY CONTAINING CITY OF FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Consolidated local government to withhold dues and deliver to bargaining unit.
law.text: Upon the written authorization of any police officers within a bargaining unit, the consolidated local government shall deduct from the payroll of the police officer the monthly amount of dues as certified by the secretary of the exclusive bargaining representative and shall deliver the same to the treasurer of the exclusive bargaining representative.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 9, effective July 13, 2004.
